caller_intent: Ignacio Solis is seeking a business insurance quote for his new LLC, I C Concrete, which will provide concrete installation and repair services, specifically requesting liability coverage.
resolution_steps: Agent Kendall collects Ignacio's contact information (phone number, email address).
Confirms business details: company name (I C Concrete), business type (LLC), address (5140 Shadow Lane Drive, Winston Salem, NC), and business operations (concrete installation/repairs).
Asks about insurance needs (confirms liability coverage is the immediate priority).
Informs Ignacio that a producer will contact him for further assistance and estimates a follow-up within 24 hours.
knowledge_required: Lead qualification process for insurance producers
summary: Ignacio Solis, owner of I C Concrete (a new LLC), requested a business insurance quote for liability coverage. Agent Kendall collected contact and business details, then committed to having a producer reach out within 24 hours. The call included references to online portals and text support options.
